name: TextSelectability
desc: A type that describes the ability to select text.

items.name: static var enabled: EnabledTextSelectability
items.desc: A selectability value that enables text selection by a person using your app.

items.name: static var disabled: DisabledTextSelectability
items.desc: A selectability value that disables text selection by the person using your app.

items.name: static var allowsSelection: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the selectability type allows selection.

items.name: struct EnabledTextSelectability
items.desc: A selectability type that enables text selection by the person using your app.

items.name: struct DisabledTextSelectability
items.desc: A selectability type that disables text selection by the person using your app.
